suncertify.client.gui

Class ContractorRecordPanel.DataEntryAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.client.gui.ContractorRecordPanel.DataEntryAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    ContractorRecordPanel

    private class ContractorRecordPanel.DataEntryAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.FocusListener
    The DataEntryAction class implements the action for focus events for the JTextField and JFormattedTextField on this panel. It implements the FocusListener interface.
    See Also:
    FocusListener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private DataEntryAction() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void focusGained(java.awt.event.FocusEvent event)
      No action is taken on "Focus Gained" events.
      void focusLost(java.awt.event.FocusEvent event)
      Performs the extraction of the value from the text field that has just lost focus and assigns the value to the contractor record.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Performs the extraction of the value from the text field that has just lost focus and assigns the value to the contractor record.

      • focusGained

        public void focusGained(java.awt.event.FocusEvent event)
        No action is taken on "Focus Gained" events. This method was implemented to satisfy the implementation of the FocusListener interface.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
